name: Formula Delta
description:
This is a demo for a physics-based racing game I am working on. There is no sound other than the countdown buzzer ( because I'm not a sound designer) and only one track. There are probably a lot of bugs too. Enjoy!

Controles

Pitch And Yaw ( Arrow keys or Left Stick )

Jump ( SPACE or X on ps4 controller )

Roll ( A and D or R1 and L1  )

Acceleration (W or R2)

Break/Reverse (S or L2)
